# Afhankelijkheden

<!--
Hier niets invullen.
Indien er dependencies zijn deze invullen in de yaml sectie van index.Rmd
-->



```{r dependencies}
dependencies <- tibble(
  protocol_code = character(),
  version_number = character(),
  params = character(),
  appendix = logical()
)

pc <- unlist(params$dependencies_protocolcode)
vn <- unlist(params$dependencies_versionnumber)
pm <- unlist(params$dependencies_params)
ap <- as.logical(unlist(params['dependencies_appendix']))

if (!any(is.na(pc))) {
  dependencies <- dependencies %>%
    bind_rows(tibble(protocol_code = pc, 
                   version_number = vn,
                   params = pm,
                   appendix = ap))
} 

if (nrow(dependencies) > 0) {
  dependencies %>%
    rename(
      `Protocol code` = protocol_code,
      `Version number` = version_number,
      `Included as appendix` = appendix) %>%
    kable()
} else {
  dependencies %>%
    add_row() %>%
    rename(
      `Protocol code` = protocol_code,
      `Version number` = version_number,
      `Included as appendix` = appendix) %>%
    kable()
}
```
